IN_STORE_RETURN.time_limit: 14 days (30 days for Alza Premium members)
IN_STORE_RETURN.conditions: Return form and purchase document (invoice or delivery note) required. Customer bears return shipping costs.  Goods must be returned within 14 days of withdrawal.  Certain goods (e.g., customized, perishable, unsealed hygienic items) cannot be returned. Gifts received with the purchase must also be returned.

HOME_COLLECTION.cost: may be subject to a fee
HOME_COLLECTION.time_limit: 14 days (30 days for Alza Premium members)
HOME_COLLECTION.conditions: For larger or heavier goods; contact customer service to arrange pick-up; return form and purchase document (invoice or delivery note) required.

DROP_OFF_PARCEL_SHOP.time_limit: 14 days (30 days for Alza Premium members)

DROP_OFF_PARCEL_LOCKER.time_limit: 14 days (30 days for Alza Premium members)

FREE_RETURN.conditions: While a 14-day (30 days for Alza Premium members) return period exists,  the customer bears return shipping costs except for AlzaBox.

QR_CODE_BARCODE_PIN.usage: A return code, generated in your customer account, is needed for AlzaBox returns.

SUMMARY: Customers can return goods within 14 days (30 days for Alza Premium members).  Returns can be made in-store, via AlzaBox, at a parcel shop, or by courier pick-up.  A return form and purchase document are required. In-store and AlzaBox returns are free; other methods may incur fees.  Certain items are non-returnable.  The customer bears return shipping costs unless using AlzaBox.
